Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-45288 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 1.2.0-13
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-45288 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 1.2.0-13. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package kubevirt is earlier than 1.2.0-13, affected by CVE-2023-45288
